channel.title: EndOfAmerica4.com
channel.description: Yeah, it was an advertisement on my TV, never saw it before so I decided to watch the video. Watched a good hour of it. What are your views on this? Could it happen?

item.title: EndOfAmerica4.com
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

how is the scam obvious? if ur talking about subscribing for investment advice and investing in precious metals is the obvious scam ok i can understand that. if not, its not that obvious. anyone that believes the US isnt in trouble everything is remain ok and soon will return to normal is very naive. On this current path we are bound to be enslaved by another country. everyone that denies such possibilities is only lying to themselves b/c they think its not possible. I wish ppl could see what i see(problems and solutions for them), or even just give a f* to make the world better. I believe if ppl started caring things would change but so many ppl are all about themselves thats the main problem to all the problems that plague humanity.

Read full topic

item.title: EndOfAmerica4.com
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

xryz:

Well if the info he says in the video is true how is it a scam? i can see about selling investment info for like $100/year could be taken that way or saying investing in precious metals like silver could but if the rest of the information is true its good info to have whether u want to use it to make investment decisions or not.

I’m not quite sure you understand what you’re saying.
The scam, is obvious.

Read full topic

item.title: EndOfAmerica4.com
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:8, topic:421998”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=524676.msg3818518#msg3818518 date=1321567112]
EndOfAmerica2k11
It is a scam, this will further explain it better then I ever could.

Also here’s some of his privacy policy…

LEGAL DISCLAIMER: This work is based on SEC filings, current events, interviews, corporate press releases, and what we’ve learned as financial journalists. It may contain errors and you shouldn’t make any investment decision based solely on what you read here. It’s your money and your responsibility. Stansberry & Associates Investment Research expressly forbids its writers from having a financial interest in any security they recommend to our subscribers. And all Stansberry & Associates Investment Research (and affiliated companies), employees, and agents must wait 24 hours after an initial trade recommendation is published on the Internet, or 72 hours after a direct mail publication is sent, before acting on that recommendation. Stansberry & Associates Investment Research, LLC. 1217 Saint Paul Street, Baltimore MD 21202[/quote]

I tip my hat to you good sir for taking the time to explain that and get the information from the site. This is where we would need that thank you button.[/quote]
Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: EndOfAmerica4.com
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

“You may know us from our ability to stop the disaster of what happened on wall street.”

Yeah, did a great job there…

Slow claps and exits page

This isn’t a scam but it’s fake, hes probably going to sell the site once it gets enough popularity to someone who will put ad’s on it.
